mapper.insert: INSERT INTO recommend(recommendNum, sortNum, num, placeName, content, tel, addr) VALUES(#{recommendNum}, 3, #{num}, #{placeName}, #{content}, #{tel}, #{addr})
INSERT INTO recommendPic(recommendPicNum, imageFileName, recommendNum) VALUES(recommendPic_seq.NEXTVAL, #{imageFileName}, #{recommendNum})
mapper.select:
SELECT r.recommendNum, r.placeName, r.content, r.hitCount, rp.imageFileName FROM recommend r JOIN recommendPic rp ON r.recommendNum = rp.recommendNum
ORDER BY r.recommendNum DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{rows} ROWS ONLY

SELECT r.recommendNum, r.num, md.userId, r.placeName, r.content, r.hitCount, TO_CHAR(r.created, 'yyyy.mm.dd') created, r.tel, r.addr, rp.imageFileName FROM recommend r LEFT OUTER JOIN memberDetail md ON r.num = md.num JOIN recommendPic rp ON r.recommendNum = rp.recommendNum WHERE r.recommendNum=#{recommendNum}
mapper.update: UPDATE recommend r SET hitCount=hitCount+1 WHERE recommendNum = #{recommendNum}
mapper.select:
SELECT recommendNum, placeName FROM recommend r
AND (recommendNum > #{recommendNum})
ORDER BY recommendNum ASC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY

SELECT recommendNum, placeName FROM recommend r
AND (recommendNum < #{recommendNum})
ORDER BY recommendNum DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
mapper.update: UPDATE recommend SET placeName=#{placeName}, addr=#{addr}, tel=#{tel}, content=#{content} WHERE recommendNum=#{recommendNum}
UPDATE recommendPic SET imageFileName=#{imageFileName} WHERE recommendNum=#{recommendNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO recommendRate(rateNum, recommendNum, num, rate, content, sortNum) VALUES (recommendRate_seq.NEXTVAL, #{recommendNum}, #{num}, #{rate}, #{content}, 3)
mapper.select: SELECT rr.rateNum, r.recommendNum, rr.num, rr.rate, rr.content, TO_CHAR(rr.created, 'yyyy.mm.dd') created, rr.sortNum, md.nickName FROM recommendRate rr LEFT OUTER JOIN memberDetail md ON rr.num = md.num JOIN recommend r ON r.recommendNum = rr.recommendNum WHERE r.recommendNum=#{recommendNum} ORDER BY rr.rateNum DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{rows} ROWS ONLY
